title: SALVATION SYRUP; OR, LIGHT ON DARKEST ENGLAND

book.title: Salvation Syrup; Or, Light On Darkest England
book.description: 简介： Twenty years ago the Hallelujah Band spread itself far and wide, but soon spent itself like a straw fire. Then arose the Salvation Army, doing the same kind of work, and indulging in the same vagaries. These were imitations of the antics of the crude...
